contact.title: Contact
contact.description:
Thank you for visiting my portfolio! I am currently employed full-time as a middle front-end developer for Redoc.co, but I am always open to new opportunities and challenges.

If you have an exciting project or part-time opportunity related to my field, I would love to hear from you. I am passionate about expanding my skill set and contributing to valuable projects. Feel free to reach out and let's discuss how we can collaborate to create something great together!
contact.address-2: Ninh Kieu District, Can Tho City

value.name: Tran Duc Phuong
value.education: Bachelor of Engineer (Valedictorian) - Can Tho University

angular.description: I have been primarily using Angular as the main frontend framework for both corporate and personal projects. Over the past 1.5 years, it's safe to say that almost every week I have either been coding with Angular or deepening my understanding of it.

subSkills.1: Implementing Basic & Reusable Building Block: Components, Directives, Pipes, etc
subSkills.2: Form Manipulation: Reactive Forms, Template Driven Forms
subSkills.5: Handle HTTP Request (RESTful API) with HttpClient
subSkills.6: Understanding Data Sharing Between Components Using Binding, Service, DI and Store (NgRx)

english.description: For over two years, I have been utilizing English as my primary working language. I am comfortable communicating in English, both in written and spoken form, and I have a good grasp of reading and understanding English documents

agile.description: I have been working in an Agile environment for over two years. I am familiar with the Scrum framework and have been using it in my daily work. I also have a good understanding of Kanban and have used it in some of my projects.
